title: Game randomly loses focus mid-match, dumping me back to desktop
body:
Quite often while playing LoL the game loses focus, as if I'd alt-tabbed or another program had suddenly pushed LoL to the background. Usually I end up back at my desktop and have to tab back into LoL. As you can imagine this is intensely frustrating when in the middle of a team fight.

This is definitely not LoL's fault, it happens with other programs as well, but it does seem more prevalent with LoL. Basically what I want to know is if there's any way to tell what other program or background process is causing this issue?

Cheers!

replies.body: Do you have any updates or anything sitting on your task bar that might be stealing the spotlight?
